# uptimekuma_notification (Resource)

Notification resource

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "uptimekuma_notification" "example" {
  name = "Generic Custom Notification"
  type = "custom"
  config = jsonencode({
    customField = "customValue"
  })
  is_active      = true
  is_default     = false
  apply_existing = false
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `config` (String) Notification configuration for the given type as JSON encoded object
- `name` (String) Notification name
- `type` (String) Notification type

### Optional

- `apply_existing` (Boolean)
- `is_active` (Boolean)
- `is_default` (Boolean)

### Read-Only

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
